title: Galaxy S9 vs iPhone X? Samsung's new Exynos 9810 chip reveals a lot
description: ![galaxys825]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * Another reason to consider upgrading to the Galaxy S9 from the [GalaxyS8](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/samsung-galaxy-s8) – or waiting forthe S9, if you’re on an older Samsung phone – is that the rear fingerprintsensor is likely to be repositioned to just below the camera sensor.
